summary: A chronicle of the life, work and mind that created the Cthulhu mythos.
cast: Robin Atkin Downes|Neil Gaiman|Peter Straub|Guillermo del Toro|Ramsey Campbell|Stuart Gordon|Caitlin R. Kiernan|S.T. Joshi|John Carpenter|Robert M. Price|Andrew Migliore|Hunter Paterra|Amber Griffin|Mark Henry|Isaac Bradley|Summer Lam|Pamela Altieri-Paterra
title: Lovecraft: Fear of the Unknown
